name: Law360News
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear the latest Law360 top news headlines as part of your Flash Briefing.

Law360 is your one-stop source for legal news and analysis, covering major developments in litigation, legislation/regulation, and corporate deals across more than 41 practice areas, industries, and states.

To find out more or take a free trial, visit law360.com today.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
